Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Houston in 2021...
Traded from Houston to San Francisco on 3/2/2021 (Going to HOU: P Santo Chavez. Going to SF: CF Sabas Delapena, P Raul Marzano)...
Injured on 6/17/2022 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/2/2023 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2024, off Richard Anderson (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2024, off Daniel Salinas (ATL)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2024, hitting .280 with 7 HR, 64 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2025...
